text: Bodenseekreis ("Lake Constance district") is a rural district (Landkreis) in the southeast of Baden-Württemberg, Germany. Neighboring districts are Konstanz, Sigmaringen and Ravensburg, and in Bavaria, Lindau district. To the south, on the opposite shores of Lake Constance (), lies Switzerland. The capital is Friedrichshafen. == History == The district was created in 1973, when the previous district Tettnang was merged with most of the district Überlingen. == Towns and municipalities == Towns Municipalities #Friedrichshafen #Markdorf #Meersburg #Tettnang #Überlingen #Bermatingen #Daisendorf #Deggenhausertal #Eriskirch #Frickingen #Hagnau am Bodensee #Heiligenberg #Immenstaad am Bodensee #Kressbronn am Bodensee #Langenargen #Meckenbeuren #Neukirch #Oberteuringen #Owingen #Salem #Sipplingen #Stetten #Uhldingen-Mühlhofen Administrative districts #Bermatingen #Daisendorf #Deggenhausertal #Eriskirch #Frickingen #Hagnau am Bodensee #Heiligenberg #Immenstaad am Bodensee #Kressbronn am Bodensee #Langenargen #Meckenbeuren #Neukirch #Oberteuringen #Owingen #Salem #Sipplingen #Stetten #Uhldingen- Mühlhofen #Eriskirch-Kressbronn-Langenargen #Friedrichshafen #Markdorf #Meersburg #Salem #Tettnang #Überlingen #Bermatingen #Daisendorf #Deggenhausertal #Eriskirch #Frickingen #Hagnau am Bodensee #Heiligenberg #Immenstaad am Bodensee #Kressbronn am Bodensee #Langenargen #Meckenbeuren #Neukirch #Oberteuringen #Owingen #Salem #Sipplingen #Stetten #Uhldingen- Mühlhofen == References ==
